duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate LNG vaporizers, liquefier, and ancillary plant equipment for LNG truck and ship operations.
Perform maintenance and troubleshooting of equipment, instrumentation, and controls, as well as security monitoring and facility inspections.
Record and evaluate operating data, initiate corrective action, and complete reports using paper and electronic formats.
Participate in continuous training for operations, maintenance, and security to comply with regulations.
Oversee work performed by contractors, work rotating shifts, respond to after-hours callouts, and assist in training lower classifications.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent with advanced training in mechanics, chemical process, or a skilled trade. Valid driver's license and ability to climb and work on ladders.
